    : a matrix to make it as similar as possible to a target matrix.

Tutorials
#########

In order to show how to use Procrustes, we have implemented some practical examples.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 1
    :caption: Practical Examples

    notebooks/Chemical_Structure_Alignment.ipynb
    notebooks/Chirality_Check.ipynb
    notebooks/Atom_Atom_Mapping.ipynb
    notebooks/Ranking_by_Reordering.ipynb

The user can download the jupyter notebook from our github repo or just use the online version
hosted by
`MyBinder <https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/theochem/procrustes/master?filepath=doc%2Fnotebooks%2F>`_.

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/binder-chemical%20structure%20alignment-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,
    :align: left
    :target: https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/theochem/procrustes/master?filepath=doc%2Fnotebooks%2F/Chemical_Structure_Alignment.ipynb

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/binder-chirality%20check-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,
    :align: left
    :target: https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/theochem/procrustes/master?filepath=doc%2Fnotebooks%2F/Chirality_Check.ipynb

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/binder-atom%20atom%20mapping-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,
    :align: left
    :target: https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/theochem/procrustes/master?filepath=doc%2Fnotebooks%2F/Atom_Atom_Mapping.ipynb

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/binder-ranking%20by%20reordering-579ACA.svg?logo=data:image/png;base64,
    :align: left
    :target: https://mybinder.org/v2/gh/theochem/procrustes/master?filepath=doc%2Fnotebooks%2F/Ranking_by_Reordering.ipynb
